name: 4 Alice Magical Autistic Girls
description:
"My name is Alice Lorange. Yes, like an orange. I'm a 16-year-old Quebecer. As I continue walking to my high school, my red hair, wavy and down to mid-back, seems to rise in rhythm with my steps. It makes me feel like I'm doing a weird dance. Yet I remain focused. My green eyes are fixed on the objective. I have to get to school on time."

Alice Lorange thinks her life is difficult because of the "Others" but when she finds herself in a strange house, it will be the least of her worries.


  • 4 Alice Magical Autistic Girls is a semi-linear visual novel. It features a teenage girl with autism.
  • Alice Lorange's story may end dramatically. Can you avoid the Premature Ends and ensure our heroine's survival?
  • Written by a Quebecer autistic woman and voiced entirely in French by the very talented Chloé Guerin! A good two hours of audio voice!
  • As the title suggests, this story contains magical girls.
  • A story of approximately 17 thousand words for the original French version. The English version got ~15k.
  • Includes a "New Game +" mode with time anomaly shenanigans.
  • All backgrounds images are in 4K - 3840x2160 !
  • You can choose to play with a text box or not (adjust transparency).


Alice Lorange 16 years old, Canada.
Alice Blondinka 14 years old, Russia.
Alice Brown 10 years old, USA.
Alice Kurosawa 20 years old, Japan.
